work.name: Samsung R&D Institute Bangladesh
highlights: Improved Samsung SmartThings Scan Nearby Feature with solving existing bugs, using this feature users can scan existing nearby devices and proceed with onboarding.
Improved and worked on SmartThings Help Card, with solving existing bugs.
Implemented UI, Utility modules independently, and wrote Unit tests of Samsung Galaxy Wearable and SmartThings project.
Developed features for Samsung Galaxy wearable, which provided users a way to connect their wearable to mobile devices.
Worked on a feature of Samsung Galaxy wearable that facilitated backup and data restoration using Samsung Account.
Follow Test Drive Development for Samsung SmartThings which increased the code coverage above 70%

awards.title: 328th place at Google Code Jam to I/O for Women
10th Place at DIU National Girls Programming Contest
NSU Inter University Girls Programming Contest
LU National ICT Fest Programming Contest

projects.name: Noughts and Crosses
projects.description: A Single player game on Android Platform
highlights: Developed Noughts and Crosses games for Android using Java an Android SDK. Implemented fixed-depth minimax AI to allow single-player games.
